attributes.action: Ensure tenants can't be evicted for owning an exempted XL Bully dog
attributes.additional_details: This means owners are worried they will have to choose between having their dogs euthanised, moving home or potentially being homeless. This should be prevented.
attributes.background: I do not think it’s right that good owners who are following the rules of exemption and have well behaved dogs might be faced with the risk of being evicted due to owning an exempt XL Bully.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
